page.title: 16MANOR HALL
page.content:
Manor Hall has had many famous visitors, including: Lulu, the Platters, Henry Cooper, several famous footballers, and a Chancellor of the Exchequer, Willie Whitelaw.
The owner of Manor Hall is Mr.Spouse. The Spouse family bought Manor Hall just after the war in 1945.
It takes two hour's to prepare a meal and,it takes two hours to clear up afterwards.
It cost's Â£3.50 to Â£8.50 depending on the kind of food the chef makes.
Manor hall has 6 full time staff.They sometimes have part time staff when required.They have a day shift and a night shift.
